name: Navona Ring Set
description:
Set of three, oval rings, shaped flat and polished in a unique brushed finish. One sterling silver, one yellow bronze and one rose bronze. The Italian rings individually measure 2mm height on the thin side and raise gradually around the ring to a height of 5mm to the feature side. As a set, the total band width consistently measures 7mm right around. Each of the three rings is unique and hand signed by Ashanti.

Navona ring set is exclusive in Australia to Fourth Crusade. See the entire collection at http://fourthcrusade.com.au

see this link to determine your ring size:
http://www.fourthcrusade.com.au/files/fc_ringsize.pdf

Of course, other sizes can be made to order. Please contact us for details or see our entire collection at http://fourthcrusade.com.au

name: WB Yeats : The Stolen Child Posy Ring
description:
Posy Ring handcrafted in Italy by Loepp and Nagai

Inscribed posy rings and unique jewellery has existed since the Egyptian dynasties. Often featuring prayers and stories, unique rings were worn as a symbol of status and wealth.

David Loepp and Yutaka Nagai inscribe the verse on each ring as done so by the original artist.  Each ring is sterling silver with a matte finish enhancing the incised black patina and is presented with a parchment copy of the original manuscript.

As one of the foremost figures of 20th century literature, Yeats was fascinated with the pagan Irish legends of faeries (fairies). The poem reflects the early influence of romantic literature and is based on Irish legend about faeries beguiling a child to come play with them.

band width: 12mm

Please use this link to determine your ring size -
http://www.fourthcrusade.com.au/files/fc_ringsize.pdf

See our entire collection at http://fourthcrusade.com.au

name: Elastic Band Necklace
description:
Hand made in Italy by Paola Volpi

This unique necklace is the statement piece of Paola’s entire collection. A creation made from coloured elastics, red pear-shaped beading and transparent acrylic threading, the closure features Paola’s Signature clasp. Total length measures 50cm. This hand made art piece speaks for itself. Extremely limited availability.

Paola Volpi is only available in Australia at Fourth Crusade.

See our entire collection at http://fourthcrusade.com.au

name: Verde No 1 Bracelet
description:
Hand made in Italy by Raris

A unique, hand-strung bracelet created in Italy utilising hand faceted, recycled green glass. Featuring three, subtle rose gold plated brass links that, in contrast with the uneven surface of the multi-faceted beads, create an alternative, bold yet elegant statement.

Each bracelet features the Raris charm of authenticity and utilises durable clear elasticised threading. Each Raris couture piece is 100% nickel free.

Although the bracelet stretches, it is made to fit around a wrist circumference of 17cm or less and weighs 50g.

Raris is exclusive in Australia to Fourth Crusade.

See http://fourthcrusade.com.au for the full collection of unique Italian made jewellery.

name: Musica Necklace
description:
Hand made in Italy by Anna Lodi

Anna has designed each original necklace from original Italian sheet music. She has adopted a Paper-mache technique to create each unique bead which is encapsulated by transparent glass-based resin. Each one is hand drilled and strung together and features a black raw silk tie on either side allowing the necklace to be worn at different lengths. Each necklace has the authentic Anna Lodi Made in Italy branding sewn in the end. Each bead measures 24mm in dameter and the total length of each necklace is approximately 90cm.

No one bead is ever the same and you are guaranteed a truly unique, Italian, hand-crafted piece.

Anna Lodi is exclusive in Australia to Fourth Crusade.

See our entire collection at http://fourthcrusade.com.au
